      • columnExists

        private boolean columnExists(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a column exists with the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name being checked
        Returns:
        boolean true if there is already a column in the gradebook with that name

      • checkChildren

        private boolean checkChildren(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<?,?> col,
                              java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a column exists with the given name as a child of a column. Checks recursively.
        Parameters:
        col - The column being checked
        name - The name beign searched for
        Returns:
        boolean true if a column exists with the given name in any child column
